website_summaries.verdict: Traditional-looking coat rack and shelf combination that provides the most amount of storage and organization for coats and other items.
pros: Sturdy shelf above the rack is large enough to keep small objects or knick-knacks in a high position
cons: Limited amount of coat hooks for various accessories like umbrellas and keys

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this item and THEN read the reviews so I was nervous after reading a lot of bad ones, however I am very happy with this..it looks beautiful, is very sturdy, and my purse actually weighs quite a bit...I've have no problems and its been up for over a month....however we did use our own anchors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Marcotte-Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice! Get better wall mounting hardware first!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Very contemporary appearance with a rich stained wood and brushed nickel hangers. Constructed pretty well. The wood assembles easily, the hooks screw on very solidly. Was very easy to install on the wall. A small level, screw driver, drill to make holes in drywall for drywall anchors. Looks fantastic on the wall! I would recommend that you swap out the wall attachment hardware that comes with the shelf with better quality ones. Good drywall anchors and stainless steel screws is what I used. Firmly attached to wall. At this price point, I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Skorzy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Shelf
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf. I was looking for something to fill this awkward space by my front door and this made my living room feel complete! It has enough shelf space for maybe one medium sized picture (I have two polorids framed) and maybe a plant or some nick-nacks. Very happy with my purchase. One thing to note; as it is bamboo be careful not to tighten too much when you assemble the shelf... I splintered some of the wood when I put my shelf together 😅 It arrived packaged very well and all the pieces were in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: The shelf is fine but as other reviewers have pointed out
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is fine but as other reviewers have pointed out, the including hardware is very bad. The plastic anchors are particularly flimsy and difficult to be installed. As suggested by another review, I'm purchasing a separate anchor/screw set to install. Quite a waste of time. They should have increased the price by a few bucks to include good quality hardware to come with an otherwise fine shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not easy to make
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is super cute- but my husband wasn’t very excited. It took him 30 min to assemble, made it wrong the first time. This doesn’t include any additional / extra wall mounts, so if you mess up the drywall hole (to put the clear stunt piece in) you’re SOL. Overall I think it’s super cute, just what I wanted visually. Just sorry it was such a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: ... just hung the shelves today and so far so good. I love the look of these
customer_reviews.text: I just hung the shelves today and so far so good. I love the look of these. I bought the light wood color. Only problem is that the screws provided are too narrow for the anchor. We ended up using some screws and anchors that we had lying around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Laina Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: There is a company name prominently displayed on the front of the shelf that is sort of tacky, in my opinion. It's also not made for 16 inches on center, so one of the brackets has to go into a drywall anchor. Having said that, it's very sturdy and looks nice and the bamboo color matches our shoe rack. I would buy it again. Well worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a functional accent to a new bathroom remodel and this was it. It looks great and it satisfies what I needed ... a place to put a couple extra towels so they will be handy, if needed by a bather. Since it is so light, I only put items on the shelf that were not heavy and about 3 bath towels on the hooks. It looks really stylish and attractive. The shelf part is not very wide, so small or narrow items fit perfectly. It has a very modern look. Glad we chose this shelf unit. I did not have any problem putting it together ... all the pieces were marked and instructions were easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cute & handy
customer_reviews.text: We have a pocket door. My dad screwed this into the door. Making the door stuck in the wall. OTHERWISE the hooks are handy & great! Idk how easy they are to assemble. My dad did that!
customer_reviews.author: Anne C Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great towel bar replacement!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the towel bar in the bathroom and to add some shelf space in the process. I saw earlier reviews about the hooks being cheap plastic, but they were sturdy metal. I knocked off a star because the drywall anchors were really flimsy and I had to substitute with a stronger anchor, but otherwise pleased with the purchase. May even order again for the other bathroom because it does look very nice, is pretty strong, and who can't use more shelf space in the bathroom?!
customer_reviews.author: Ferleigh

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Hooks
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked the design, as it was great to have an extra shelf above the coat hooks for decoration and storage. However, the hooks are pretty flimsy. We have had the shelf for a few months now and 3 out of the 5 hooks have broken off (see photo). We were not hanging heavy items on the hooks, but our dog tugs on the coats and bags, and the metal hooks break off in the middle, leaving the metal base behind. We're going to have to deinstall and replace this with something more sturdy and dog-proof.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R

customer_reviews.title: Swap the plastic anchors for toggle bolts
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks nice. Made a few modifications to mine, I drilled 2 more holes on the bottom, I felt like 2 hole weren't enough to hold it if I put a heavy coat on all the hooks. Also, anchor it with toggle bolts from your local hardware store, the plastic anchors it comes with wont hold for long.
customer_reviews.author: Louisville502

customer_reviews.title: Buy this shelf, but buy your own wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. It was exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to assemble, and it feels sturdy. I deducted one star because the manufacturer included the cheapest wall anchors possible. We ended up having to buy a pack of better anchors to mount the shelf on the wall. Other than that, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: GGLUVBUG

customer_reviews.title: Nice for simple lightweight use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking. Purchased for my three kids coats, hats, hoodies etc. that always end up landing on our entry floor. Giving 4 stars: At least 50% of a pieces, the "finish" had minor to moderate scratches Also a Anchors/screws provided were not strong enough for a shelf/coat rack. Had to purchase separately from hardware store
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I've used this as an entrance shelf for keys, lanyards, and it's been a good place to put up things like wallets, notes, etc. It's also very nice-looking, and it doesn't feel cheap or weak like other put-together-yourself products that I've seen. This will be a shelf I keep for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelepi Ita

customer_reviews.title: The packaging;and the product so disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived as If someone just got a couple of pieces of stained wood & threw it in a box, all loose. No instructions, no hooks or screws.
customer_reviews.author: Saya

customer_reviews.title: Drywall mount sucks
customer_reviews.text: The drywall mounting stuff sucks. I went to Home Depot and bought some better ones. Also put in a could extra screws that when into studs and now it's pretty solid. Looks real nice and works well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Cute coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to assemble. Perfect for my entry way. The shelf is a little high to be useful, perhaps I installed it a bit too high, but didn't want any coats to hit the floor or shoe rack. Would definitely recommend to others. Good price and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: The hooks I received are metal, not plastic as some reviews mentioned. The rack and shelf were easy to assemble and mount. I would have preferred 4 points for mounting rather than two, however it should be able to withstand the weight of a good amount of jackets. I am happy with it and would recommend it to others. I do not have an image to upload but the image provided by the seller is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. Assembled easily. All parts included. Using in bathroom to hold two towels, dry brushes, robe, etc. Did not use enclosed drywall hangers...felt they might not hold up under weight of everything to be hung on hooks plus lightweight items on shelf. Look good. Color slightly lighter than cabinets, but far enough away, not very noticeable. Has been up about a week. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: TxBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Uh, it holds my towels well?
customer_reviews.text: I somehow managed to assemble the top part upside down. (Don't ask because I don't have an answer that makes me look good in the end) anyway, it's very sturdy. Color is as expected. My towels fit nicely on the hooks. 🤷‍♀️ what more can you say about a towel rack really? Oh, and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5 of the holes  for the hooks don't like up.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this. The holes that the hooks are supposed to fit in don't line up. The first 2 did but the last 3 did not. Unusable.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to hang coffee mugs on in my kitchen. One of the hooks immediately broke upon arrival, and I haven't figured out a good way to fix it yet (probably gunna use some strong adhesive). But the other hooks have held up fine for the past few months, so it isn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own screws/drywall anchors.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat rack, my only complaint is that the screws that come with it feel like they’re too short to support it, and the drywall anchors it comes with are junk. Otherwise, the construction of the piece itself is great. It’s all solid wood and looks great in our entryway. Packaging was also good.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to hang jackets and backpacks that didn’t take up a whole lot of space. I wasn’t expecting a whole lot out of this since it really wasn’t all that expensive, but I decided I could at least let the kids hang their jackets on it. WOW was I surprised. It was easily put together and so, so sturdy! We can hang all 4 of our coats/jackets up, plus a book bag, work bag, and diaper bag without even the slightest look it’s going to give out. I want to buy more for other things in my house!!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Evans

customer_reviews.title: not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: unless you’re planning on hanging light weight items, this product is not for you. it’s designed to screw onto drywall so any heavy object will pull this thing out along with a gaping hole in your wall. plus the mounting hardware is a joke. i had to buy larger screws and use a stud finder to hang this thing up. not worth the trouble. also, since it’s not designed to screw onto studs, i had to make my own holes in order to mount it onto the wall since studs are only 16” apart. the holes on this thing are 23inches apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Alba

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: My son asked for a coat rack for Christmas, he wanted a sturdy one as he tends to load them up, and we liked that it also had a shelf to put gloves and such on top. He got it assembled and mounted in a short period of time and it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: buzymomof3

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Pieces do not fit properly.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very surprised this has as so many high reviews. The pre-drilled holes in the wood were not properly measured. so the shelf and the hook rack do not sit parallel. The difference is visible. The shelf does not sit flush against the wall. The cutouts for the vertical pieces are too large. I've provided photographic evidence to support each of these complaints. I'm very disappointed with the quality of this product, and would not recommend it, or anything else from this company, to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: michael asmundson

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it works and was easy enough to install. If you run a 16" on center studs, be prepared to use a toggle bolt or quality drywall anchor. There is no forgiveness on hardware location to alight the brackets to the studs.
customer_reviews.author: Cornbread

customer_reviews.title: Not bad - buy your own hardware
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad shelf. Looks good on the wall & pretty sturdy. However, the hardware that was provided is terrible. The hooks are too short to latch, so we had to go buy longer ones.
customer_reviews.author: Bhink3120

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was easy enough to put up(though I used my own hardware), and looks nice. Seems sturdy and is unlikely to break down since it'll see only moderate use. Great value for a product that looks almost high-end.
customer_reviews.author: F. Foley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned and used this shelf for a year and I’ve been inclined to write a review now because in the past month 2 out of the 5 hooks have bent right off. A third hook has been unusable essentially since purchase as the screw inset was stripped. We noticed upon assembly which unfortunately was past return date. Overall, don’t expect longevity at all. If you’re using this for anything other than dog leashes or keys beware!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Gunther

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: I had to install on one stud and one dry wall so I had to make adjustments to the screw hole on the shelf to accomodate the toggle. Other than that, installation was smooth. I've had the sheld up in the bathroom for the past month or so and it has held up to 4 towels with decorations on the shelf with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl1922

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Great rack/shelf. My gf bought it for the bathroom and our towels hang from the hooks. I am not fond of it being used in the bathroom but I would definitely use it by a door for light jackets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Mustradi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made sturdy addition to organize your key etc.
customer_reviews.text: This well made, sturdy, functional and attractive piece looks very nice in hall or entryway &’is an excellent way to keep keys, purses, umbrellas close at hand while having a shelf to add a decorative display.
customer_reviews.author: thawsout

customer_reviews.title: Good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small space. Easy to put together although I did have trouble getting the hooks to screw in so they wouldn’t wiggle. Amazon shows you the “buy together” option which is where I found this with the shoe rack. They go perfectly together. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coat and hall rack
customer_reviews.text: I found it exactly what I needed, well constructed and good looking. Only problem is that I ran unexpectedly into a metal obstruction within the wall and still trying to figure out how to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Health Nut

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack, instructions could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice piece, though it took me a long time to assemble. The instructions were not very good and I have been building a lot of furniture in the last week so I am not new to this. I put the shelf on upside down by mistake at first and then realized I like it that way better so I changed it back.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Simple clean design
customer_reviews.text: Easily mounted on wall. BUT we needed to get better anchor bolts at the hardware store in order to mount it in our garage--thus it lost a star. Its our catch-all spot for sunglasses, sunscreen and baseball caps in our garage for our dog walks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price - most other reviewers give what I think is an accurate description. I haven’t had any issues with the hooks though, but I also don’t overload a cheap coat hanger.... so I don’t know lol
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: No assembly instructions, screw holes not milled correctly.
customer_reviews.text: Starting to put this shelf together, the hook holes are not large enough to let the screw through, holes not milled correctly. Need counter sunk holes or longer screws, so you need to either drill out the holes or get longer hook screws. And I've just started to put it together. Don't know what else I will run into.
customer_reviews.author: Denice Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, sturdy rack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, sturdy rack. I'm using it in a bathroom to hold towels. The anchors didn't work but we had other ones so it was no problem. I guess a lot depends on the type wall you are securing it too. Did not fit flush but the problem was the wall and not the rack. Shelf on top in side enough for a small vase and toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: vbsooz

customer_reviews.title: great coat rack, buy your own mounting hardware though!
customer_reviews.text: great coat rack, had to buy some heavy duty wall mounts, the ones that come with it are no good. I got ones with two metal clips that fold down and pop open like a grappling hook after inserted through the drywall, very sturdy, we have large winter coats, it has no problem holding them.
customer_reviews.author: Sliver of Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product; received in great condition
customer_reviews.text: Received it very quickly; easy instructions, easy to put together, looks great, happy to have a place to hang coats/hats instead of on chairs/couches ~thinking of ordering another one THANKS
customer_reviews.author: KDW

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: We needed a set of coat hooks for a small space behind the front door. The space is only 6 inches deep, so it was a challenge to find something just the right size. After looking at lots of options, and reading lots of reviews, I decided on this one. It's perfect! Good quality, easy-to-follow assembly instructions, and looks exactly like what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is gorgeous. I love the wood color, it's super sturdy, and it looks like it's solid good quality. It was easy to assemble and I receive a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Woods

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install/assemble, works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I use it to hang coats near the front door and put my keys and sunglasses on the top shelf. Really elegant and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M

customer_reviews.title: It’s the bamboo.
customer_reviews.text: So many things made with cheap press board these days priced way higher. I took my chance & am happy about it. It’s because Of the bamboo such a simple design can be so sturdy. It was easy to assemble. I think it will be just fine for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matiwose

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So simple to put together and exactly what I was looking for 😃
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Segert

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom. Got it within a week and put it it together myself. Not too hard to do. Good quality product and the color is nice too. My mother uses this for her sweaters, jackets and her purse.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lagace

customer_reviews.title: Langria Wall Mounted Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelf, we put it in the kitchen to hold coffee and tea and cups. I like the bamboo texture very easy to install and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Pi

customer_reviews.title: great little coat rack and shelf
customer_reviews.text: it was easy to assemble and hang. it was a nice upgrade from our prior coat rack with no shelf
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but cheap made in china laminate
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product in fact it’s kind of attractive and serves the purpose for which it is designed. I was a little disappointed tho because I thought it was real wood not laminate over fiber board. $33 for faux wood is too much no way this should have been more than $25 but I’m not returning it and it looks nice. Wouldn’t buy it again but won’t send it back kind of thing. Hey it happens
customer_reviews.author: Jason P Willey

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this shelf! As others have noted, the hooks are made of plastic not metal but they feel sturdy enough. Just don't yank down on them or hang up anything too heavy and you'll be good!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what's up with this one but the one I got smells horribly strong of almost polyurthane but not, difficult to explain. I have let it sit in my garage for 2 weeks and used baking soda to remove the smell but its still there and super strong. I refuse to put it up in my home because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Pollard1

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: When assembled, it's a tiny bit less than flush mounted on the wall. Other than that, it's great! Holds coats, dog leashes, and the shelf on top is perfect for keys and other miscellaneous items (like dog waste bags).
customer_reviews.author: E. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely smaller than what it appears on the picture, but the dimensions are accurate - just make sure you measure your space before ordering. It holds a TON of coats, hats, and other items on the top shelf. We don't have coat closets in our old home, so this is it for us. I have 3 kids and a husband and it holds all of our coats and hats beautifully!
customer_reviews.author: WAQuillen

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a simple but functional shelf made from wood not MDF. This fits the bill perfectly. It took me less than ten minutes to assemble. It was easy to hang. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: We use it to hang our night clothes and to hold candles and potpourri jars in the bedroom. Well made. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is pretty amazing. It is pretty functional and looks great. Could be a little more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Dustin G.

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: The hooks are very close together. The images are not true to scale. Cheap material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy and looks great! We used this to create a mudroom area. Pulls the little space we have together and organizes at the same time. I love the color and size
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Wanted a shelf with hooks to organize my baby carriers in the nursery and this fit my small space perfectly!! Very sturdy and matched my light wood furniture.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Be careful assembling
customer_reviews.text: For people complaining about the hook screws stripping out...the screws have less than a 1/4in of thread so be easy, go slow and don't overtighten. I have 5 heavy coats hanging on it with zero issues. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good item. In addition to being a coat hanger, the shelf can be used for keys an mail
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it--the looks of the shelf and the hooks: it's perfect for what I wanted and works very well for my intended purpose. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: like buying furniture from Ikea
customer_reviews.text: Item comes as a puzzle, like buying furniture from Ikea. But when completed it's very nice. Not upscale but nice unit for the price. I am using as a towel rack in camper bathroom where storage space is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hank Worcester

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. It was easy to put together and mount onto the wall. I suggest using better anchors if you don't mount at least one side onto any studs.
customer_reviews.author: RST

customer_reviews.title: What a great price and it looks good to until you cover it with junk like that I do LOL
customer_reviews.text: This definitely holds a lot I would’ve never expected to be able to put so many items on it but it can hold probably run 8 to 10 jackets with no question that it will stay up with ease
customer_reviews.author: Mmh424

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, very attractive
customer_reviews.text: very nice, looks great on wall right under our AMAZON entryway shoe storage bench. recently received, happy with both products purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Coat Hook Rack
customer_reviews.text: This shelf hook rack is sturdy and looks great by my door. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Sent me the wrong item!
customer_reviews.text: Sent me a different item than the pic. Super disappointed because I bought it to match a bamboo shoe rack that I already put together. Now the item is more expensive than when I ordered it so I'm going to pass. The other reviewers pics look nice but I was not sent that shelf!
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great for trophy & medal display
customer_reviews.text: This shelf worked for what we had in mind! Holds all trophies& medals... worried for next season!
customer_reviews.author: LKshopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for our remodeled shower/laundry room. Easy to assemble and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Sucky dry wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: I really like the finished product. However, the dry wall anchors absolutely sucked. Needed to go out and buy new ones. Other than that I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: I use this as a spice rack
customer_reviews.text: I installed this over my stovetop as a spice rack at the cabin, and we hang keys, flashlights and garage door openers on the hooks. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia in MT

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wall mounted rack. Fair price, and better quality than anything I could find in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jaidion

customer_reviews.title: better product
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the better products I've purchased in awhile. Great price great product. Easy to assemble. Great packaging protection. Would purchase more items from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We were so impressed with the look and durability of ...
customer_reviews.text: We were so impressed with the look and durability of this item. I would've given it a 5 star but there was a small nick in the wood thank goodness it was on the shelf and you cant see it with items on it.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. King

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful coat rack and shelf
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together real nice finish The quality of the piece was very surprising and would highly recommend it to anybody who wants a nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.author: Luv2dance

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Easy to hang. Arrived promptly and in perfect condition. Jackets and leashes look so much better on this than they do on the floor! Who would have thought?!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Langria Bamboo hook
customer_reviews.text: It is installed in the my walk in closet to organize my purses and it is perfect there. It is pretty I liked the finish it is beautiful very natural looking, I definitely recommend it for all kind of purposes
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: To much work for 30 dollor shelf paid extra for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware screws Had 20 parts to put togetherbi had get screws at local hadware store once put togther had to hang on wall 3 hour ordeal over priced over working iteam
customer_reviews.author: bobby digital

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf. I do wish the top was a little deeper and wider...but I would still buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice. I’m very happy with it. Took a little bit to put together but not that hard and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our entry. We have no closet so needed a stylish hanging coat rack. Holds our winter coats easily and I like the simple shelf on top for a bit of decor. Great price, easy install.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice. Was simple to put together and fits nicely behind the front door with out keeping door from opening all the way.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra Larson

customer_reviews.title: Cute in my utility room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my utility room remodel. Easy to put together and install. Looks really great
customer_reviews.author: SpyritSeekr

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with the coat rack
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with the coat rack. I was easy to assemble and attach to the wall. Everything was included. It looks more expensive than it was. Just follow instructions step by step and you will not have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: xyz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but hooks are coming lose
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good and was easy to assemble. However, I am having issues with the hooks not getting tight enough. The screws seem to be too short cuz they aren't really fastening properly into the back of the hook. You can keep twisting, but they just comes lose from the threads. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Zanliot

customer_reviews.title: Go buy good drywall anchors before trying to mount
customer_reviews.text: It came with CHEAP drywall anchors. I put some really nice holes in the wall trying to use what came in the package. I had to go to Home Depot to buy legit anchors that I could screw the rack into. Highly irritating.
customer_reviews.author: EJR

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be holding up well
customer_reviews.text: We've hat it up in our front entry for almost a year and still love it.
customer_reviews.author: FIguy

customer_reviews.title: Wall shelf with hooks
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. My son put together in no time and hung it up for me and I can put my sweaters on the hooks and they are right there when I need them. The shelf is so cute for nick nacks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice coat rack that is easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Looks Beautiful! and is Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install! I was very impressed with how it had to be put together! easy and nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Judith B.

customer_reviews.title: Good little shelf/coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. Just wish the sides screws had caps - looks a bit unfinished.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: it’s beautiful! it added a perfect touch to my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. If you want something that is easy to install and looks really nice then definitely consider this product.
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful, quality product. The design and materials are lovely. Looks great in my foyer!
customer_reviews.author: Vorkosigrrl

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Holds lots of jackets and hats. Price was right, and it was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

product_meta.title: LANGRIA Coat Rack Shelf, Coat Rack Wall-Mounted Bamboo Wooden Hook Rack with 5 Metal Hooks and Upper Shelf for Storage Scandinavian Style for Hallway Bathroom Living Room Bedroom, Bamboo Brown Color
feature_bullets: BAMBOO DESIGN: modern and functional clothes, towels and hat rack with 5 metal hooks; hold your coats, bags, scarves, umbrellas, dog leashes, bathrobes, etc.; the minimalistic look with Scandinavian inspiration complements most decors
STURDY STRUCTURE: this wall-mounted coat rack is designed to be solid enough to handle your family's coats and jackets (up to 33lbs. / 15kg)

EXTRA STORAGE SHELF: the upper flat shelf in this rack is perfect for storing smaller items like letters, mails, herbs, spices, bathroom necessities or displaying photos, small plants and knick knacks
SPACE SAVING CONCEPTION: use it in your bedroom, entryway, foyer, mudroom, bathroom, laundry room or kitchen or anywhere short on space; keep these places neat and organized

ASSEMBLY: requires an Allen wrench (included), a Philips screwdriver & a drill (not included); it has a water-based water-resistant coating that is easy to clean with a damp cloth; dimensions are manually measured with a possible deviation of 1-3cm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars695 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
